title.en: Combine and match biodiversity data from separate sources

description.en: This process combines and matches biodiveryity data, i.e. occurrences for various species, from the sources GBIF, iNaturalist and VertNet, with data provided by the user or other sources. For more details, please ask BOKU.

input_data_retrieved.title: Occurrences (GBIF, iNaturalist, VertNet)
input_data_retrieved.description: URL to the table containing the occurrences from GBIF, iNaturalist and VertNet. This can be the outcome of the getdata process.

input_data_from_user.title: Occurrences (user-defined)
input_data_from_user.description: URL to the table containing the occurrences from the users.

colnames_species_names.title: Column name: Species names
colnames_species_names.description: List of column name that indicate the Species Name in each of the provided datasets. Example: "speciesname, scientificName"

colnames_countries.title: Column name: Country
colnames_countries.description: List of column name that indicate the Country in each of the provided datasets. Example: "JDS4_sampling_ID"

colnames_lat.title: Column name: Latitude
colnames_lat.description: List of column name that indicate the Latitude in each of the provided datasets. Example: "lat, latitude"

colnames_lon.title: Column name: Longitude
colnames_lon.description: List of column name that indicate the Longitude in each of the provided datasets. Example: "lon, long, longitude"

matched_biodiversity_data.title: Combined occurrences
matched_biodiversity_data.description: A table containing the combined occurrences (user data and online data).
